short_summary: Office furniture purchase and delivery to 550 de la cite, Gatineau, Quebec.
description: Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) Template. Here you will find the scope of the procurement: 1. Product Category: Product Category 2 - Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products; 2. Library and Archives Canada has a requirement for the purchase and delivery of office furniture to 550 de la cite, Gatineau, Quebec; 3. Procurement is required amongst the General Stream of Suppliers (SA holders); 4. Requirement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chili Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement and the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement.
duration_in_months: That the detailed list of specifications is attached to the bid solicitation.
full_summary:
Tender Announcement
----------

**Product Category: Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products**
===========================

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01005060  
**Amendment Number:** 3  
**Solicitation Number:** 5Z011-23-0141  
**Tender Closing Date:** September 7, 2022, 2:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time)  
**Contracting Entity:** Library and Archives Canada  

**Tender Description:**
Bibliothèque et Archives Canada is seeking to acquire freestanding height-adjustable desk/table products for its employees. The contractor must be able to deliver the products to the required destination (550 de la Cité, Gatineau, Québec, J8T 0A7) by November 25th, 2022.

**Trade Agreements:**
The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)  
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement  
- Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement  
- Canada-Chili Free Trade Agreement  
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement  
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement  
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement

**notice URL:** None  
**Attachments:**
